title: app crashes when pressing label
body:
### What happened?

A bug happened!

I created a label and when pressing it it crashes the app

### App Version

7.3.0

### Android Version (API Level)

36

### (Optional) Relevant log output

```shell
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at androidx.navigation.ui.ActionBarOnDestinationChangedListener.onDestinationChanged(SourceFile:145)
	at androidx.navigation.NavHostController.dispatchOnDestinationChanged(SourceFile:108)
	at androidx.navigation.NavHostController.navigate(SourceFile:112)
	at androidx.navigation.NavHostController.navigate(SourceFile:25)
	at com.philkes.notallyx.presentation.view.main.label.LabelVH$$ExternalSyntheticLambda0.onClick(SourceFile:323)
	at android.view.View.performClick(View.java:8083)
	at android.view.View.performClickInternal(View.java:8060)
	at android.view.View.-$$Nest$mperformClickInternal(Unknown Source:0)
	at android.view.View$PerformClick.run(View.java:31532)
	at android.os.Handler.handleCallback(Handler.java:995)
	at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:103)
	at android.os.Looper.loopOnce(Looper.java:248)
	at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:338)
	at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:8982)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at com.android.internal.os.RuntimeInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(RuntimeInit.java:593)
	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:932)
```
